test-suite.name: Post deployment validation tests for serviceses
test-suite.description: Post deployment validation tests for serviceses

test-case.description: Service BITS status should be running
test-case.name: Describing validation tests post deployment.Post deployment validation tests for serviceses.Service BITS status should be running
test-case.label: Make the service 'BITS' in running state.

test-case.description: Service BITS startmode should be automatic
test-case.name: Describing validation tests post deployment.Post deployment validation tests for serviceses.Service BITS startmode should be automatic
test-case.label: Open PowerShell as administrator and run 'Set-Service -Name BITS -StartType automatic'

test-case.description: Service wuauserv status should be running
test-case.name: Describing validation tests post deployment.Post deployment validation tests for serviceses.Service wuauserv status should be running
test-case.label: Make the service 'wuauserv' in running state.

test-case.description: Service wuauserv startmode should be automatic
test-case.name: Describing validation tests post deployment.Post deployment validation tests for serviceses.Service wuauserv startmode should be automatic
test-case.label: Open PowerShell as administrator and run 'Set-Service -Name wuauserv -StartType automatic'

test-suite.name: Post deployment validation tests for folderpermission
test-suite.description: Post deployment validation tests for folderpermission

test-case.description: user RDFC\Test should have FullControl permission on path c:\Deployment\config
test-case.name: Describing validation tests post deployment.Post deployment validation tests for folderpermission.user RDFC\Test should have FullControl permission on path c:\Deployment\config
test-case.label: Give FullControl permission for RDFC\Test user on c:\Deployment\config folder.

test-case.description: user RDFC\kvprasoon should have FullControl permission on path c:\Deployment\files
test-case.name: Describing validation tests post deployment.Post deployment validation tests for folderpermission.user RDFC\kvprasoon should have FullControl permission on path c:\Deployment\files
test-case.label: Give FullControl permission for RDFC\kvprasoon user on c:\Deployment\files folder.

failure.message: Expected 'FullControl' to be found in collection @(), but it was not found.

test-suite.name: Post deployment validation tests for firewallrule

test-case.description: A Firewall rule with name Rule1 should be available
test-case.name: Describing validation tests post deployment.Post deployment validation tests for firewallrule.A Firewall rule with name Rule1 should be available
test-case.label: Open wf.msc and create an Inbound rule with name 'Rule1'.

test-case.description: Firewall rule Rule1 should be allowed for Inbound connection
test-case.name: Describing validation tests post deployment.Post deployment validation tests for firewallrule.Firewall rule Rule1 should be allowed for Inbound connection
test-case.label: Open wf.msc and create the firewall rule 'Rule1' for Inbound connection.

failure.message: Parameter set cannot be resolved using the specified named parameters.
